Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.store

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UpdateLocalRegion  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalRegion
    A region that stores data in a separated directory.
    LocalRegionFlusherAndCompactor
    As long as there is no RegionServerServices for a 'local' region, we need implement the flush and compaction logic by our own.
    LocalRegionParams
    The parameters for constructing LocalRegion.
    LocalRegionUtils  
    LocalRegionWALRoller
    As long as there is no RegionServerServices for a local region, we need implement log roller logic by our own.
    LocalStore
    Used for storing data at master side.
